description: [OSX_OCEANLOTUS.D](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0352) uses the command xattr -d com.apple.quarantine to remove the quarantine file attribute used by Gatekeeper and Notarization checks.(Citation: Trend Micro MacOS Backdoor November 2020)(Citation: 20 macOS Common Tools and Techniques)

external_references.description: Magisa, L. (2020, November 27). New MacOS Backdoor Connected to OceanLotus Surfaces. Retrieved December 2, 2020.
Phil Stokes. (2021, February 16). 20 Common Tools & Techniques Used by macOS Threat Actors & Malware. Retrieved August 23, 2021.
